Welcome!

Each project you create will have it's own tab! You can add projects by clicking the green plus at the top! Each project can have its own tasks to be added below. Each tasks can have notes to give you a more specific look. Done with a task? Check it off! Don't need a task? Click it off. You can do the same thing with projects. If you've complete it, check it off. Don't need it anymore? Remove it. What are you waiting for? Start managing!
